item.title: Debloat Android
item.author: contact@christitus.com (Chris Titus)
item.description: This article goes over using ADB Platform Tools and utilizing adb to uninstall packages by using these tools.
item.dc:creator: Chris Titus

item.title: Degoogle Apps
item.author: contact@christitus.com (Chris Titus)
item.description: This article goes over the apps that work and don’t work with a Degoogled phone without google play services installed
item.dc:creator: Chris Titus

item.title: Get rid of Amazon Fire Launcher without root access
item.author: contact@christitus.com (Chris Titus)
item.description: This How-To shows you how to get rid of Amazon Fire Launcher without root access. Amazon Fire 5.3.3 OS can’t be downgraded or rooted, and since the Fire tablet line auto-updates, this leads many folks with the horrible experience of using the Fire OS with their gimped store/subscriptions.
item.dc:creator: Chris Titus
